member.name: IPropertyDescriptionAliasInfo.GetAdditionalSortByAliases
member.summary: Gets the address of a pointer to the interface, which contains additional sort column values.
member.param: A reference to the identifier of the requested interface.
When this method returns successfully, contains the address of a pointer to an interface.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: IPropertyDescriptionAliasInfo.GetSortByAlias
member.summary: Gets the address of a pointer to the interface containing the primary sort column.
member.param: A reference to the identifier of the requested interface.
When this method returns successfully, contains the address of a pointer to the interface for the calling object.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: IPropertyDescriptionAliasInfo
member.summary: Exposes methods to get the "sort by" columns properties for an item. This interface is used by UI objects that want to retrieve the primary or secondary sort columns for a given property.
